channel.title: The monsters are really attack slow how do i change that?
channel.description:
the monsters are really attack slow how do i change that?
i attack him 5 turns than he attacks about 1 turn
i wanna know how do i change that?
because u also can change the time that they standing when they die so also after how many seconds/turns they attack maybe?
could anyone help me plz
